author: Darrin Fong
name: dwi2mask Brain mask generator
description: Generates an whole brain mask from a DWI image.All diffusion weighted and b=0 volumes are used to obtain a mask that includes both brain tissue and CSF

inputs.description: An image file to be used as a template for the output (the output image will have the same transform and field of view).
inputs.name: template

inputs.description: Provide either an isotropic voxel size (in mm).
inputs.name: vox size

inputs.description: Provide either a comma-separated list of 3 voxel dimensions.
inputs.name: vox dimensions

inputs.description: Specify output image data type.
inputs.name: datatype

inputs.description: Perform track mapping in directionally-encoded colour (DEC) space
inputs.name: dec

inputs.description: Map streamlines to dixels within each voxel; requires a number of dixels (references an internal direction set).
inputs.name: A number of dixels

inputs.description: Map streamlines to dixels within each voxel; requires a path to a text file containing a set of directions stored as aximuth/elevation pairs
inputs.name: dixel directions file

inputs.description: Generate a Track Orientation Distribution (TOD) in each voxel; need to specify the maximum spherical harmonic degree lmax to use when generating Apodised Point Spread Functions
inputs.name: tod

inputs.description: Define the desired form of contrast for the output image Options are: tdi, length, invlength, scalar_map, scalar_map_count, fod_amp, curvature (default: tdi)
inputs.name: contrast

inputs.description: Provide the scalar image map for generating images with 'scalar_map' / 'scalar_map_count' contrast, or the spherical harmonics image for 'fod_amp' contrast
inputs.name: image

inputs.description: Define the statistic for choosing the final voxel intensities for a given contrast type given the individual values from the tracks passing through each voxel Options are: sum, min, mean, max (default: sum)
inputs.name: stat_vox

inputs.description: Define the statistic for choosing the contribution to be made by each streamline as a function of the samples taken along their lengths Only has an effect for 'scalar_map', 'fod_amp' and 'curvature' contrast types Options are: sum, min, mean, max, median, mean_nonzero, gaussian, ends_min, ends_mean, ends_max, ends_prod (default: mean)
inputs.name: stat_tck

inputs.description: When using gaussian-smoothed per-track statistic, specify the desired full-width half-maximum of the Gaussian smoothing kernel (in mm)
inputs.name: fwhm_tck

inputs.description: If a streamline has zero contribution based on the contrast & statistic, typically it is not mapped; use this option to still contribute to the map even if this is the case (these non-contributing voxels can then influence the mean value in each voxel of the map)
inputs.name: map_zero

inputs.description: Upsample the tracks by some ratio using Hermite interpolation before mappping (If omitted, an appropriate ratio will be determined automatically)
inputs.name: upsample

inputs.description: Use a more precise streamline mapping strategy, that accurately quantifies the length through each voxel (these lengths are then taken into account during TWI calculation)
inputs.name: precise

inputs.description: Only map the streamline endpoints to the image
inputs.name: ends_only

inputs.description: Dump the scratch buffer contents directly to a .mih / .dat file pair or .mif file, rather than memory-mapping the output file (this is useful if either the image is larger than half the available RAM, or a network file system is in use where writing to a memory-mapped output file performs very poorly)
inputs.name: dump

inputs.description: Specify a text scalar file containing the streamline weights
inputs.name: tck_weights_in

inputs.description: Display information messages.
inputs.name: info

inputs.description: Do not display information messages or progress status.
inputs.name: quiet

inputs.description: Display debugging messages.
inputs.name: debug

inputs.description: Force overwrite of output files.
inputs.name: force

inputs.description: Use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications
inputs.name: nthreads

inputs.description: Terminate program if a warning is produced
inputs.name: failonwarn

inputs.description: Display this information page and exit
inputs.name: help

inputs.description: Display version information and exit
inputs.name: version

inputs.description: The input track file
inputs.name: tracks

inputs.description: The output track-weighted image
inputs.name: output
